description:
A mysterious individual approaches Kotone and offers her a house for free. Kotone wastes no time and jumps on the opportunity, without a single doubt or worry.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Summer! Mizugi ga Niau Sugoi Ii Ouchi, Mitsukemashita!
Summer! We Found a Great House for Wearing Swimsuits!
サマー! 水着が似合うすごい良いお家, 見つけました!
